client_error.heading: Rất tiếc! Đã có lỗi xảy ra
client_error.description: Chúng tôi rất tiếc vì sự bất tiện này. Có một lỗi đã xảy ra, và chúng tôi đang nỗ lực khắc phục. Vui lòng thử lại sau.

something_went_wrong.description: Đã có lỗi xảy ra, vui lòng thử lại sau.

happy_box.choose_first_letter: Please choose the first letter of first name
happy_box.challenge_section_description_1: The vibrant spirit of Tet, brimming with the colors of spring, has filled every corner of Wellspring Saigon! This is the perfect time for every WISers to pause, reflect on the past year refresh themselves, spread the love, and create meaningful Tet memories.
happy_box.challenge_section_description_2_3: ? - A journey to capture radiant moments, embracing the festive essence of Well-Spring Festival 2025 - Happy Home Grows My Spring!
happy_box.challenge_section_description_3: Get your best angles ready and join us in welcoming a truly unforgettable Tet season.
happy_box.video_section_gift_description_4: will receive gifts from the Organizers
happy_box.video_section_countdown_description_3: See you WISers at the upcoming Well-Spring Festival on
happy_box.thankyou_modal_description_2: You have completed the Tet challenge.
happy_box.thankyou_modal_description_3: Wishing WISer a new year full of joy and happiness
